term.title: isodiazenes

item.text: Compounds having the structure [image: Not defined]. These compounds can also be called diazanylidenes or hydrazinylidenes. They have also been called by the trivial name azamines and the incorrectly formed name 1,1-diazenes. They should not be called aminonitrenes.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1344 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)
